title: Minimal and Functional
description: Notetxt is designed with a simple and minimal user interface, while also minimizing any unwanted distractions, letting you focus on your thoughts.

title: Markdown Support
description: Edit and preview notes side-by-side with live Markdown rendering! It includes support for most base Markdown syntax and a few Remark/Rehype plugins.

title: Simple, Yet Useful Features
description: Notetxt includes multiple features that can help you improve your workflow while taking notes, such as slash commands, metrics for your notes, exporting of notes, and more!

title: Manage Multiple Notes
description: Access and manage your notes from the Note Manager! You can manage various aspects of your notes from here, such as tagging them to sort and find better, downloading them, renaming them, and more.
